resources.string: Touch to add this person as a contact.
Touch to give this person your contact info.
Unable to transfer file via Android Beam. File size too large.
Unable to start transfer. Try again after current transfer completes.
You are being requested to open a URL tag (%s).
You are being requested to save contact info %s to Contacts. Continue?
Do not ask me about NFC again
You can select up to %d items.
Select a file you want to share and try again.
DRM (Digital Rights Management) protected files cannot be shared.
Save the file and try again.
There is not enough space in the device storage. Delete some items and try again.
%1$s is requesting permission to use %2$s. Allow?
Tap the NFC reader again with your device to complete the payment with %s.
Your default tap and pay service has been removed. Without a default service selected, some tap and pay transactions may not be processed. Tap SETTINGS to select a new default service.

The application you have just installed is unable to handle NFC transactions under your current settings. To use NFC with this application, go to Settings > NFC > Advanced settings, and change your default processing method.

The application you have just installed is unable to handle NFC transactions under your current settings. To use NFC with this application, go to Settings > NFC and sharing > NFC > Advanced settings, and change your default processing method.

The app you have just installed is unable to handle NFC transactions under your current settings. To use NFC with this app, go to Settings > NFC and payment > MORE, then select Advanced NFC settings and change your default processing method.
You have exceeded the maximum number of NFC applications. In order to use the application you downloaded, go to Advanced settings and change your default NFC routing.
NFC not available for this app

The application you have just installed is unable to handle NFC transactions under your current settings. To use NFC with this application, select the NFC applications below and uninstall them, then download and install %s again.
There is not enough space in your NFC storage. To use this service, go to Tap and pay settings and remove some services.
There is not enough space in your NFC storage. Remove some services and try again.
Your device does not support S Beam.
NFC will be turned on so you can use NFC services.
The device has taken longer than %d seconds to read this tag and more battery power is being consumed. Change to NFC card mode or turn off NFC via the quick settings panel.
Touch another device with this device to share the content.
%1$s is requesting permission to use %2$s. Allow?
To use Android Beam, NFC will be turned on.

"NFC exchanges data between this phone and other devices or targets (such as payment devices, access readers, or interactive ads and tags). While NFC alone does not ensure a secure transfer of data, specific applications and services may offer or enable technology that provides reliable and secure channels.
Protect your phone and your data against vulnerabilities such as data theft, device setting manipulation or system corruption, by using passwords, anti-virus or other security software and conducting NFC transactions with caution."
Process cancelled due to the app of %1$s
The service with the valid setting of Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.) has been uninstalled, etc. To use other services, make the valid setting with Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.). Make the setting?

"Could not update the setting content of Tap & Pay since there is not enough space in the NFC memory. Of the services of Tap & Pay (others), make services that won't be used invalid and check the setting content with Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.)."

The valid setting of Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.) has been initialized due to changing of the UIM card, etc. To use services distributed by the UIM card or app, perform the valid setting of services in Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.).
The valid setting of Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.) has been changed to %s since the service that had been set to valid in Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.) has been uninstalled, etc.
The valid setting of Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.) has been changed to %s
Could not acquire the UIM card status since the Osaifu-Keitai function of the UIM card is locked, etc. Check the services set to valid with Tap & Pay (credit cards, etc.).
Default payment settings does not applied because NFC memory is full. Please try again, after deactivate the other services.
The default payment settings is removed. To enable the payment service, please choose the prefered default payment service by Tap & Pay.
To change the settings, please enter the same password used for NFC/Osaifu Keitai Lock (4 to 8 characters)
Allow applications to access mPOS service
The NFC tag on the back of your device is being read repeatedly. This results in increased battery consumption. \"Remove the tag from your device or turn off NFC.\"
NFC exchanges data between this device and other nearby devices or targets, such as payments terminals, access readers, and interactive ads or tags.

"NFC exchanges data between this device and other nearby devices or targets, such as payments terminals, access readers, and interactive ads or tags. While NFC alone does not ensure a secure transfer of data, specific applications and services may offer or enable technology that provides reliable and secure channels. Protect your phone and your data against vulnerabilities such as data theft, device settings manipulation or system corruption, by using passwords, anti-virus or other security software and conducting NFC transactions with caution."
